description.value:
You break or tear an unenhanced structure or object you touch that is not being worn or carried by a creature other than you. The break or tear can be up to 1 foot in any dimension. When cast this in this way, this power has a casting time of 1 minute.

Alternatively, you can touch a droid or construct when you cast this power. Make a melee tech attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes [[/r 1d6]] energy damage. When cast in this way, this power has a casting time of 1 action.

This power's damage increases by [[/r 1d6]] when you reach 5th level ([[/r 2d6]]), 11th level ([[/r 3d6]]), and 17th level ([[/r 4d6]]).

Alternatively, you can touch a droid or construct when you cast this power. Make a melee tech attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes [[/r 1d6]] energy damage. When cast in this way, this power has a casting time of 1 action.

This power's damage increases by [[/r 1d6]] when you reach 5th level ([[/r 2d6]]), 11th level ([[/r 3d6]]), and 17th level ([[/r 4d6]]).
